full_text: From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: RE: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054 Sent: Tue, 30 Jul 2019 13:51:34 +0000 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Are you still good for a 2 pm call today to continue our discussions from yesterday? (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Partner (b)(6) @steptoe.com +1 212 506 (b)(6) direct | +1 917 349 (b)(6) mobile | +1 212 506 3950 fax Steptoe Steptoe & Johnson LLP 1114 Avenue of the Americas | New York, NY 10036 www.steptoe.com This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2019 7:59 AM To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com Subject: EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054 Good morning (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) I wanted to let you know that there may be a brief delay in getting your client to attorney-conference this morning as he is getting a shower, haircut, medical assessment, etc. Thank you, (b)(6) DOJ-OGR-00023851
